attributes.action: realise that by agreeing to expand a number of airports & planning to increase fuel duty, that these will give completely contradictory results
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i.e. bigger airports means more passengers flying and therefore more planes burning fuel whilst increasing (what is already an extremely high rate of) fuel duty is intended to reduce the number of cars on the road to cut emissions.
